mapper.select: SELECT tlal.ip, COUNT(tlal.ip) AS cntIp FROM t_link tl INNER JOIN t_link_access_logs tlal ON tl.full_short_url = tlal.full_short_url WHERE tlal.full_short_url = #{param.fullShortUrl} AND tl.gid = #{param.gid} AND tl.username = #{param.username} AND tl.del_flag = '0' AND tl.enable_status = #{param.enableStatus} AND tlal.create_time BETWEEN #{param.startDate} and #{param.endDate} GROUP BY tlal.full_short_url, tl.gid, tlal.ip ORDER BY cntIp DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT SUM(old_user) AS oldUserCnt, SUM(new_user) AS newUserCnt FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT DATE(tlal.create_time)) > 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS old_user, CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT DATE(tlal.create_time)) = 1 AND MAX(tlal.create_time) >= #{param.startDate} AND MAX(tlal.create_time) <= #{param.endDate} THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS new_user FROM t_link tl INNER JOIN t_link_access_logs tlal ON tl.full_short_url = tlal.full_short_url WHERE tlal.full_short_url = #{param.fullShortUrl} AND tl.gid = #{param.gid} AND tl.username = #{param.username} AND tl.enable_status = #{param.enableStatus} AND tl.del_flag = '0' GROUP BY tlal.user ) AS user_counts
